level.description: Flag that sets the access level for entity. 0: open publicly (for non-registered users), 10: open for registered users only, 20: open for registered users that were given explicit permission only, 30: open for all registered users from my organization only, 40: open for all registered users from my organization's team only, 50: open for all registered users from my organization's team that were given explicit permission only

type.description: A flag that sets up the access type. 0: read-only, 10: read + comment, 20: read + comment + edit
